original_title: Opening the Lost Tombs: Live from Egypt
overview: Maury Povich hosts this exploration of Egypt's pyramid of Khamerernebty II and the unopened Tomb of the Unknown by Dr. Zahi A. Hawass, Undersecretary of State for Egypt's Giza Plateau. Also: an examination of the mummy Nefer in Saqqara.
title: Opening the Lost Tombs: Live from Egypt
